post.body: Shit! That sux bollocks. I am so sorry Polly. I know that the the next opportunity will come along before you know it.
As far as I can tell India is still on "PAC" alert level. But it is worrisome as both are nuclear armed countries.
Cupcakes are always a good thing imho. :-)
:-) Ha! It is nice to be needed. Client came in person with a dispute that needed resolution. Problem is solved.
Jeepers, creepers. What are they doing to you over there? ;-)
And the saga of the battery's slow death goes on. :-) Or did you find a spare?
It hasn't hit freezing yet has it?
You should really consider making your twitter a/c private. It will help to keep it locked down, if that is what you desire. :-)
What type of room? Were there padded walls? ;-) I do know the feeling though. :-)
Hear you on that one. :-)
I would love an artificial white-water kayak play/practice course.
Cool! Is that your actual mug? I am used to the alien now. ;-P
Ha! On not an I-Fon. :-)
You bet and OK City is not all that far from StL. :-)
Robert you get my first grin and nod of the head for today. :-)
Re. N96 It looks pretty cool from afar. Let me know how you like it, please. :-)
Is that you CeeBee? :-)
Yo, Jeremiah. That was scary. We had the same thought pattern going there for a sec. Good Morning. :-)
I was just thinking of you Edythe. Big HUGZ in your direction. :-)
I am like that with Battlestar Galactica.....such a sci-fi geek that I am. Still is odd to have Starbuck be a hot chick though.
OK. I'll bite I read the site. Explain in tweet if possible how to privately insure someone with a major pre-existing condition.
It just depends on my mood and the seasons I guess. I watch more in the Winter months. Color me dubious, my sweet. :-)
I hear you on that good friends and good drink equals good times and an empty bottle. ;-)
Robert I dare you to break Twitter. ;-) Double-dog dare ya. :-P
Less ads is nice on Hulu and it's HD. :-) I never claimed to be perfect esp. regarding torrents. ;-)
I might have to come visit you and @geosteph if that is the case. ;-)
I am thinking about ditching the DVR and just using Hulu and bit torrent. I am making a final decision before the new year.
Great, thank you! :-) Much of the same for me this evening. Record several shows on the dvr and then watch sans advertising.
Porridge first, you know the rules. ;-)
I do so like grown women. :-) Hey good looking, what ya got cooking? :-)
Stop breaking wind Robert. ;-P
Did you read Dave Winer's post about this incident? What are your thoughts?
Not sure how the Bond meme developed. :-)
Cool beans on the name change. @mediaphyter was correct I hope. :-) No one ran away did they?
Indeed it would Goldfinger. :-)
Grind and brew the Starbucks beans at home for my own cafe au lait. Much cheaper that way. :-)
Nice! I luv me some Spreadhead magic! :-)
I am pleased with BrightKite. You should check it out. It has a lot of possibilities and potential. :-)
Ack. I keep bouncing from the site. I will try it at home. :-)
If I had eaten that many latkes....I would have popped. :-)
Yes, they were here scouting locations and such. (re. Clooney vehicle)
Wondering why I even considered dashing hm to let the beast out and dashing back to work an 11 hr day. Didn't even make it 5m b4 wk called.
A/R Collection Time. Yahoo!!!! - http://bkite.com/02TRg

Fire alarm. Plz evacuate the bldg. - http://bkite.com/02Szn

Good morning everybody. :-)

“I am ready to scream. Our effin healthcare system is smoking crack.” http://ff.im/h8Q0
I'm at Hilton St Louis Airport (10330 Natural Bridge Rd, St Louis, MO 63134, USA) - http://bkite.com/02WbE
Wow. Where did that time fly to. Time to get my butt into gear. - http://bkite.com/02W5a
It kind of stinks that my TweetBeepAlert for Hilton which I meant for hotels usually is about Paris & Perez. - http://bkite.com/02W4W
Reading: "St. Louis Jazz Notes: Jazz this week: "A Soulful Christmas," Jim Manley, a tribute to Louis Armstrong, Erin Bode, and more" ( ...
RT:News: Oklahoma River chosen for kayak training site - NewsOK.com: Oklahoma River chosen for kayak training .. http://ping.fm/MaKb4 -...
And just like that, Virginia, the paycheck was gone. ;-) Happy Holidays! :-) - http://bkite.com/02W3W
Oh....and paying the bills. How festive. ;-) - http://bkite.com/02W3x
Checking my G-Mail and scanning my Tweet Alerts. So far I like the application. - http://bkite.com/02W3l
Saying a small blessing for all those w/o a job during this holiday season. My prayers & thoughts go out to you and your families.Big HUGZ.
G'Night Ya'll. Sleep well and stay warm. :-D
New Blog Post: Sunset - Mountains near Barrington Tops: Sunset - Mountains near Barrington Tops Or.. http://tinyurl.com/6lsscx
Watching some Monday night tv via dvr. I will check inwith all of youse later. :-) (or sooner)
INSPIRING CHANGE » Blog Archive » Random Is Never Random http://ff.im/iTVl
Yep. I am talking to you Spencer and John. HFF Men! :-)
I am basking in the positive glow that I feel when I get e-mails saying that real world friends of mine have reconnected using me a nexus.
I am raising my glass to all those survivors of disease and to those still keeping up the good fight (and their support networks)!1! :-)
Must re-work my Ping.Fm settings tonight.
